subTitle: Blog description
style: <style>@font-face{font-family:'WQYRotateCJK';src:url('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/garywill/vert-cjk-web/master/wqy-microhei-rotate90cjk.ttf') format('truetype');}.post-content.vert-mode{writing-mode: vertical-rl;font-family:'WQYRotateCJK','SimSun',serif !important;user-select:text !important;overflow:hidden;}.post-content.vert-mode pre,.post-content.vert-mode code,.post-content.vert-mode table,.post-content.vert-mode img,.post-content.vert-mode .chart,.post-content.vert-mode blockquote{writing-mode: horizontal-tb !important;transform: rotate(0deg) !important;font-family:inherit !important;}#vert-toggle-btn{position:fixed;top:10px;right:10px;z-index:100000;padding:6px 12px;background:#333;color:#fff;border:none;border-radius:4px;cursor:pointer;}</style>
